alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 10 at 4:47PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with gusts to 55 mph will impact portions of Teton, Fremont, central Jefferson, north central Bonneville, Madison and eastern Clark Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 445 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Monida to 6 miles northeast of Hamer to near Shelley. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...Mesonet observations. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rexburg, Rigby, Driggs, Ashton, Dubois, Felt, Ririe, Idmon, Henrys Lake, Marysville, Lorenzo, Victor, Iona, Sugar City, Ucon, Menan, Teton, and Roberts. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain
